title: Screening: Zorn (2016-2018)
description:
Doors will open at 2:30.

Mathieu Amalric's documentary Zorn (2016-2018) began as a European TV commission that was quickly abandoned in favor of something more intimate: an ongoing dialogue between two friends that will always be a work in progress.

Zorn (2016-2018)
France, 2017
Directed by Mathieu Amalric
Editing: Caroline Detournay
Sound editing: Sylvain Malbrant
Mix: Victor Praud
Production: Film(s)

About the artist

Eclectic actor, Mathieu Amalric has been in many films, from arthouse cinema to American blockbusters. He has twice won the César of Best Actor, in 2005 and 2008. As a director, he won in 2010 the Best Director Award at the Cannes Film Festival for his film On Tour.

This screening will also occur from 1:00-2:00 in Price Auditorium.
